reference.title: GitLab Community Edition Docker Container
reference.shortdesc: The gitlab/gitlab:ce container provides a fully-featured instance of the GitLab git server and GitLabl continous Integration (CI) server.

section.p: The GitLab container provides two essential components of a DFST system: a remote versioning repository (git in this case) and a continuous integration (CI) server.
The default DFST setup uses the configuration as specified in the GitLab Docker container documentation.
